topic.title: Show Account details: FTS03.01.01.03
topic.shortdesc: Show Account details step is needed to show the user account details to understand what account you operate with right now.

body.p: Show Account details step has following parameters and methods:
Step Persistent ID (create unique ID within manufacturer domain):
Step Life Cycle Status (select inReview or Released ): inReview
Step is a part of what business Task (select):
Step is represented by what UI control:
Step is a part of what software component (select):
Step may be accessed through what connector (select):
Step may be accessed (step calling) using what API method (select reference pages):
